title: Early marriage
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Parent participation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Teenage marriage

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenage marriage

Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Married people
description: Deals with teenage marriage, high school counselling and classroom teaching of marriage preparation. Failures are often due to parents and schools making young marriages difficult, rather than ensuring their success. Discusses types of marriage, religious and civil. Symbolism of the ring and post nuptial ceremonies, which should demonstrate the approval and support of parents and friends.
